post.text:

comment.author: Nikolai
comment.text: Go Red! Best advertisement is social media. Change your pics to flow red. Turn every State. NC we are a huge decider Go Red 2016..

replies.author: Sydney
replies.text: How do I turn it red

replies.author: Nikolai
replies.text: Sydney you can get my picture if you want add to your profile pics. Change back after

replies.author: Nikolai
replies.text: Click on my pic by my name take a screen shot then change your profile pic. It's Trump campaign pic

replies.author: Riley
replies.text: Yes how do you turn pics red ??
